Interface Edge

  • All Superinterfaces:
    GraphObject
    All Known Implementing Classes:

    public interface Edge
extends GraphObject
    Wrapper interface for edges in a graph to be queried.
    Author:
    Ozgun Babur

        int getSign()
        Algorithms may need a sign for the edge. 1: positive, -1 negative, 0: signless.
        Returns:
